name: Ch9BaAchievement
condition: any(game.level.regions.get('Amelia').contains(unit.position) for unit in game.get_units_in_party() if unit.nid == 'Amelia')
_source: speak;Gheb;You!|You're the brat girl from before!|What are you doing here?|Can't you see the enemy is all around of us?!|Useless girl!
speak;Amelia;Do you truly fight for Grado?...
speak;Gheb;Bah, I'm the commander, does it even matter?|All that matters is you listen to me!|...Or do you need a special lesson taught by me?
speak;Amelia;ENOUGH!|You are a vile pig!|You bring shame to all of Grado!|It's time for you to fall!
speak;Gheb;Insolent brat!|I'll make you eat those words!
speak;Amelia;I will bring you down in the name of Grado!
